EmailTemplate.name: 17.Core.AirFrame.none.N.G.E.12204.AirFrame CTO.Email 2 - Nokia Shared Data Layer
EmailTemplate.subject: How could Nokia Shared Data Layer boost your network capacity?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Shared Data Layer Unleash your business potential by getting more from your data Realize the full potential of your core network data with Nokia Shared Data Layer. Download our paper to learn how it can help to make your functions more agile, and how it enables improved scalability by consolidating your subscriber and session data. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
